ch0019_00_yuki/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ], I’ve been
waiting for you! Come on. Let’s get going!
ch0019_00_yuki/0101_0701_02_10:
I think we’re gonna meet lots 
of different Pokémon today!
ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0701_01_10:
The other day, I was wondering where my
Treecko went. Turns out, he was clinging
to the ceiling!
ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0701_02_10:
I was looking at him, wondering what he was
up to, when he suddenly came diving down
onto my face.
ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0701_03_10:
Seems like it’s his new hobby or something.
He surprised me, but I did get a good laugh, too!
ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0702_01_10:
I told you about my Treecko and his new hobby
of diving onto people’s faces, right?
ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0702_02_10:
Well, we smacked heads when he tried that last
time. Ever since then he’s become a bit more
careful before he dives.
ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0702_03_10:
It’s really funny watching Treecko carefully
line up his jump!
ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0701_01_10:
When I was back in the Hoenn region, my Taillow
would curl up on my head whenever it got cold.
ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0701_02_10:
I think it liked it there ’cause my head is warm.
It was pretty much Taillow’s special spot.
ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0701_03_10:
I don’t mind it when it’s windy, since it keeps
my hat from blowing away, but...
ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0701_04_10:
I have to admit, Taillow gets a bit heavy when
it sits on my head for too long.
ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0702_01_10:
I get worried sometimes that Taillow might just
go ahead and turn my hat into a full nest.
ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0702_02_10:
In the spring, it even catches the Worm Pokémon
Wurmple and leaves them on my hat!
ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0702_03_10: Maybe it’s too late about the nest thing, huh?
ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0701_01_10:
My dad is actually a pretty amazing
Gym Leader.
ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0701_02_10:
And my dream is to become a better Pokémon
Trainer than my dad!
ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0701_03_10:
So I want to learn even more about Pokémon
and become stronger than I am now.
ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0702_01_10:
Someday, I’d love to become a Gym Leader
with my favorite Pokémon.
ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0702_02_10:
And be an obstacle for Trainers to overcome,
just like my dad.
ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0702_03_10:
In order for my dream to come true, I’d better
be able to win in the PML, at least!
ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0701_01_10:
You know, I have a friend named May.
She’s my best rival!
ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0701_02_10:
I still remember the first time we had
a Pokémon battle, back in the Hoenn region.
ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0701_03_10:
I’d never had a heated Pokémon battle like that,
where we both give it everything we have!
ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0702_01_10:
May’s always cheerful and energetic, but when
she watches stars at night, she gets really quiet.
ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0702_02_10:
We were watching shooting stars the other day,
and every time she saw one, her eyes lit up.
ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0702_03_10: Her eyes were really pretty, too, like stars!
ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_01_10:
You need a rival for a journey, right?
Like, a friend who helps you keep going 
and challenges you to become stronger!
ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_02_10:
Yeah, I’ve got May, but it’s not like we’re
always together here.
ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_03_10: Besides, I can never have too many rivals.
ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_04_10:
Now, I’d really like my rivals to be strong
and dependable—like a partner almost, right?
ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_05_10:
You wouldn’t happen to know anyone like that,
would you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0702_01_10:
In case it wasn’t clear, I was thinking about you
when I was talking about all that rival stuff, OK?
ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0702_02_10:
I might as well be direct.
You’re definitely one of my rivals now, OK?
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0019_00_yuki/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, I was just looking for you!
ch0019_00_yuki/1701_0701_02_10:
You can have this.
My Pokémon found it stuck in a tree.
ch0019_00_yuki/1701_0702_01_10: It was a pretty good item, right?
ch0019_00_yuki/1701_0702_02_10:
I personally like it a lot, so I hope it comes in
handy for you, too!
ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0701_01_10:
Do you remember what inspired you to become
a Pokémon Trainer?
ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0701_02_10:
For me, it was my dad. I always wanted to be
an amazing Trainer like him.
ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0701_03_10:
I’ve become stronger so that I could catch up
to him.
ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_01_10:
My dad’s a Gym Leader, and I’ve battled
him before. I won that time.
ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_02_10:
I might have defeated him when he battled me
as a Gym Leader, but...
ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_03_10:
I still don’t feel like I’ve really surpassed him yet.
He has more knowledge, more experience,
more everything.
ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_04_10:
So someday, I want to become the better
Pokémon Trainer, in every way!
ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_05_10:
That’s why I have Pokémon battles every day!
I want to really get to know all the Pokémon,
just like my dad!
ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0701_01_10:
As I’ve watched you get stronger, I’ve started
feeling something. I think it’s anxiousness?
ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0701_02_10:
Until now, all I really thought about was
overtaking my dad. But now, you’re on my mind.
ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0701_03_10:
I don’t want you to leave me behind—or even
catch up to me! That’s what helps me become
even stronger.
ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0701_04_10:
I’ve said it before and I’ll say it again:
you’re definitely my rival!
ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0702_01_10:
I’m glad you’re my rival, you know.
It’s helped me become even stronger!
ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0702_02_10: I guess this is what you call a healthy rivalry.
ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0702_03_10:
Finding a worthy opponent, and competing with
them as rivals...
ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0702_04_10:
Don’t you think it’s a good way to be?
You’d better stay sharp. You’re one of my
best rivals now!
ch0019_00_yuki/3001_0701_01_10:
Great weather this morning!
Good thing we got up early!
ch0019_00_yuki/3002_0701_01_10:
Hey!
I woke up to the sounds of chirping Pokémon.
Anyways, I’ll be counting on you today!
ch0019_00_yuki/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s afternoon already?
The perfect time for Pokémon battles!
ch0019_00_yuki/3004_0701_01_10:
There’s a lot of stuff on sale here,
so you can always find something new.
ch0019_00_yuki/3005_0701_01_10:
I want to know more about Pokémon you
can only find at night!
ch0019_00_yuki/3006_0701_01_10:
Wow, the stars are beautiful tonight.
Maybe we’ll see a shooting star!
